title: Changing masteries or runes causes connection timeout in pvp.net

replies.body:
You may have a general poor connection to the servers, which causes the PvP.net disconnections. Since this is often caused by conflicting network settings, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
I tried everything and nothing helped.

In that case, we'll need to take a closer look at your system and network logs in order to troubleshoot this further and find the culprit. I recommend running a set of these logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you encounter issues.
